summary: Add Oath of Ysgramor (purity track) and enforce no-Thu'um in werewolf form.

changes.change: Add CANNOT USE THE THU'UM WHILE TRANSFORMED limitation to werewolf_form. Add full oath_of_ysgramor persistent power (purity track, levels 1-3, Man & Mer trait, Tongue of the Ancestors trait, Second Wind and Bladestorm stunts, Bad Blood limitation).
Update companions_inner_circle_rites refusal reward to explicitly unlock Oath of Ysgramor power.
Add restrictions section with werewolf_form rule: werewolves cannot use the Thu'um while transformed.
